org.apache.flink.runtime.client

Class AbstractJobResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.client.AbstractJobResult
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOReadableWritable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JobCancelResult, JobProgressResult, JobSubmissionResult

    public abstract class AbstractJobResult
extends Object
implements IOReadableWritable
    A AbstractJobResult is the super class of all results to report the job operation. It contains a return code and an optional description.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AbstractJobResult.ReturnCode
      The possible return codes for a job operation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractJobResult

        public AbstractJobResult(AbstractJobResult.ReturnCode returnCode,
                 String description)
        Constructs a new abstract job result object and sets the description.
        Parameters:
        returnCode - the return code that shall be carried by this result object
        description - the optional error description

      • AbstractJobResult

        public AbstractJobResult()
        Construct a new abstract job result object. This constructor is required for the deserialization process.
